6.09: Shadow Fiend is now allowed to build  Manta Style. Replaced Dark Flames with  Requiem of Souls
6.60: Increased  Presence of the Dark Lord armor reduction from 1/2/3/4 to 2/3/4/5.
6.40: Increased movement speed from 295 to 300. Increased  Presence of the Dark Lord radius from 500 to 900.
6.42: Shadowraze Reduced radius from unknown to 250. Fixed razes damaging wards.
6.02: Fixed  Necromastery's souls cap being at 30 on each level, instead of 8/15/23/30.
6.03: Reduced attack range from 550 to 500. Shadow Fiend is no longer allowed to build a  Manta Style. Increased  Necromastery level requirement from 1/3/5/7 to 3/6/9/12. Reduced Dark Flames damage per interval from 6/12/21 to 4/10/17.
6.05: casting  Shadowraze no longer causes Shadow Fiend to forget his previous orders.
6.06: Reworked  Presence of the Dark Lord
6.07: Increased  agility gain from 2.2 to 2.4.  Necromastery now loses 50% of the stored souls upon death, instead of 100%.
6.09b: Reduced  Necromastery level requirement from 3/6/9/12 to 1/3/5/7.  Requiem of Souls Reduced cast time from 2.67 to 1.67. Reduced number of lines from 1 per soul to 1 per 2 souls. No longer releases one extra line regardless of souls count. Increased damage per line from 40/80/120 to 80/120/160. Reduced manacost from 150/200/250 to 150/175/200. Reduced cooldown from 120 on each level to 120/110/100. Now reduces movement speed and attack damage of enemies within a 700 radius upon cast by 15%/20%/25%.
6.39: Shadowraze Increased radius from unknown to unknown. Reduced manacost from 95/105/115/125 to 75 on each level.
6.78: Requiem of Souls Rescaled movement speed slow from 15%/20%/25% to 20% on each level. Increased attack damage reduction from 15%/20%/25% to 50% on each level.
6.75: Increased  Necromastery soul count gain upon killing heroes from 6 to 12. Increased  Presence of the Dark Lord armor reduction from 2/3/4/5 to 3/4/5/6. Added a passive component to  Requiem of Souls
6.74: Necromastery Now grants 6 souls at once upon killing heroes, instead of 1. Increased max souls cap from 8/16/24/32 to 12/20/28/36.
6.10: Increased  Requiem of Souls speed of lines from unknown to 700.
6.73: Increased movement speed from 300 to 305. Increased  agility gain from 2.4 to 2.9. Increased  Necromastery max souls cap from 8/15/23/30 to 8/16/24/32.
6.81: Requiem of Souls movement speed and attack damage reduction debuff now pierces spell immunity.
6.82: Increased  Necromastery max souls cap from 12/20/28/36 to 15/22/29/36.  Requiem of Souls Movement speed and attack damage reduction debuff is now applied to every unit damaged by the lines, instead of independently to units within a 700 radius. Increased movement speed slow from 20% to 25%.
